responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
We offer BCA, MCA, BBA, MBA, and more.
Admissions usually start in April. You can apply online on our website.
The fee structure varies by program. For MCA, it's around 70,000 per year.
You can reach us at 0120-1234567 or email contact@college.edu
We have a 90% placement rate with top companies like TCS, Infosys.
Our faculty includes PhD holders and industry experts in each domain.
Yes, our library is open from 9 AM to 7 PM. Students can borrow up to 3 books.
Yes, hostels are available with separate buildings for boys and girls.
Goodbye! Feel free to ask more anytime.
